stripped_text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. Hosted virus counter: +2 strength.
text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. Hosted virus counter: +2 strength.
title: Hantu
